评论详情: I loved the look and it was perfect for the occasion. I should have ordered a small.
This blouse is well tailored and fits true to size chart. I was delighted to discover the front neck ruffle and the brooch are removable to add versatility and ease of laundering. Well done.
Easy to adjust waistline with corset-type ribbons in the back.  Lovely sleeves and neckline.
I’m not sure if I got a used one, but it smells like cigarettes. It’s absolutely disgusting. Stunk up my entire bedroom.
It don't fit so I'll wait until I lose some weight because  I can't bottom it up at all.
I love the material of this shirt, it’s very comfortable and fits perfectly. If you’re petite the sleeves are a little long, but overall great.
For me it came with everything (collar and pendant). It feels comfortable, fits perfectly, and looks just like it does in the image.
If fits my body, contour is perfect length and on the circumference

I liked the style and fabric. But, you should add one size up. The buttons especially in bust area were to far apart. Which cause an opening. Otherwise I would have loved it. I did buy two in too different sizes. I am hoping the second one will fit the person I purchased it for as a Christmas gift.
I love this top but it didnt come with the collar sadly

came exactly as described n how i expected it to be ^^.  the fabric itself is rather mediocre, but its not uncomfortable and it pretty much looks like the image.  there wasn't many reviews so i was unsure but im happy with it !!
So beautiful and it fit perfectly! I knew my measurements and matched them with the chart to get my size. The chart is very accurate.

Die Bluse kam völlig zerknittert an. Auch durch Waschen bei 40°C blieben die unerwünschten Falten bestehen. Bevor ich die Bluse anprobieren konnte, musste ich sie tatsächlich erst bügeln, was sehr viel Mühe kostete, denn die vielen Rüschen mussten alle glatt gebügelt werden. Erst dann konnte man sehen, wie der Sitz der Bluse ist.  Die erste Bluse (M) zeigte sich nach dem Bügeln als zu groß.  Ich schickte sie zurück und bestellte dieselbe Bluse in Größe S.  Die passt jetzt hervorragend für eine Person mit Größe 38/40.
